titles: A brief remembrancer, or, The right improvement of Christ's birth-day.
author: T. C.
publisher: Printed by E.T. and R.H. for William Miller at the Gilded Acorn in S. Pauls Church-Yard, near the Little North door,
notes: Verse: "The glorious day doth now begin to dawn ..."
Imperfect: cropped at foot affecting imprint; date of publication suggested by Wing.
Reproduction of original in the British Library.
keywords: Jesus Christ --  Poetry --  Early works to 1800.
